title: Emmy Sofa
description:
Art, architecture, and woodworking inform the Emmy Sofa (2019), with its fluid lines and solid wood details that mix modernism and tradition. Cozy corners welcome you like an old friend, while pillowy cushions with just the right firmness convince you to linger awhile. Based in Brooklyn, Egg Collective was founded in 2011 by designers Stephanie Beamer, Crystal Ellis and Hillary Petrie. The trio adeptly meld their individual areas of expertise, including art, architecture, and woodworking, into sculptural, heirloom-quality modern furniture that evokes their own histories and memories. The Emmy Sofa is tailored but relaxed, with a curved frame that creates cozy corners in which to curl up. Baffled back cushions with a feather-silk fill add just the right amount of support. “The Emmy speaks to multiple generations,” says Beamer. “Youthful yet mature, it resonates with a sense of modernism and tradition. It’s a place to feel at home.” Made in U.S.A.
  • Relaxed but tailored appearance.
  • Curved frame creates cozy corners to curl up in.
  • Baffled back cushions with a feather-silk blend.
  • Visually interesting from all angles.
Brand
Design Within Reach
Collection
Emmy Collection
General Dimensions
  • 31" H 81" W 38" D
Product Weight
194 lbs

title: Pastille Sofa
description:
Our customers asked and we answered. Designed by Hlynur Atlason exclusively for DWR, the Pastille Collection (2022) is designed for people who want a lounge-like sofa but without the super-low seat. This comfortable collection is plush and inviting with a memory-foam top, but still easy to get in and out of thanks to the higher seat and high, firm arms. Made in the U.S. from domestic and imported parts.
  • Comfortable, lounge-like seating without the super-low seat.
  • Easy to get in and out of thanks to the 18.5" seat height.
  • Memory foam toppers on seat cushions for a welcoming sit.
  • Sculpted high-density, high-resiliency foam cushions ensure a long-lasting clean look.
  • Fully upholstered cushions, frame, and legs finished with a single-needle topstitched detail.
  • Part of the Pastille Collection, which also includes a sectional, lounge chair, and ottoman.
Brand
Design Within Reach
Collection
Pastille Collection

  • 32" H 80" W 35" D

title: Reid Sofa
description:
When it came to creating the comfortable Reid Collection (2007), designers Jeffrey Bernett and Nicholas Dodziuk held nothing back, creating an inviting spot for watching movies, reading, or surfing on a laptop. Unlike sofas where you sit "on top" of the cushion, the Reid Sofa offers a plush seat to sink into, thanks to down- and feather-wrapped foam. The back cushions are filled with a soft blend of down and feathers, and the wide armrests offer ample arm support.
  • Supportive foam seat cushions wrapped in Featherblend™ fill.
  • Plush back cushions filled with a blend of down and feathers.
  • Upholstered in fabric or whole hides of fine leather for very few seams.
  • Your choice of 1" (block) or 4" (black powder-coated tubular) legs.
  • Tubular legs increase heights of all pieces by 3" for a higher sit.

title: Como Sofa
description:
To create his Como Collection (2007), Italian designer Giorgio Soressi enlisted one of the most widely respected companies in Italy. Located near Lake Como, this family-run business is still producing best-in-class sofas and chairs for many prestigious retailers to this day, blending design, research, cutting-edge technologies and artisanal techniques. The elegant and extremely well-constructed Como Collection is built with solid steel frames and cast-aluminum legs. Contrasting that heft and stability are cushions that scream, “You’ve got to sit here!” with their goose feather filling and variable-density foam that’s firmer in front for support. Made in Italy.
  • Plush, comfortable sofa.
  • Solid steel frame with natural goose-feather and foam-filled seat cushions.
  • Elegant, tailored sophistication.
  • Two Como Throw Pillows included.
Piumafil® yarns are all-natural, biodegradable and Oeko-Tex® certified

title: Quilton Lift Sofa
description:
Featuring elegant solid wood legs, the Quilton Lift Sofa (2024) takes HAY’s popular collection to a new level. Described by designers Nipa Doshi and Jonathan Levien as a “quilted landscape sofa system,” Lift creates a platform to live, work, socialize, and relax. Its elevated sitting area features finely detailed quilting that adds softness and volume to its generously sculptured form. Foam wadding ensures lounge-like comfort. The two-seater sofa is available in numerous upholstery options with legs in lacquered walnut or oak. Made in Poland.
  • Comfortable, inviting sofa with deep seats.
  • Solid walnut or oak legs elegantly lift it from the floor.
  • Generous sitting area and rounded, sculpted forms.
  • Part of the Quilton Sofa and Sectional Collection.

title: Kelston Sofa
description:
The inviting, smart-looking Kelston Collection (2016) features large seating areas, wide arms, and feather-blend cushions. Articulating headrests on the sectional and sofa let you adjust individual headrests to just the right angle and height for reading or watching TV – or fold them out of the way when not in use. Everything you need for rest and relaxation. Made in Italy.
  • Individually articulating headrests.
  • Feather-blend cushions.
  • Leather or fabric upholstery.

title: Stack Sofa
description:
The embracing, oversized proportions of the Stack Sofa (2024) by ELLISON STUDIOS turn lounging into an art form. Its layered pillows atop a recessed oak plinth base create a wonderfully plush yet elegant profile. A mixture of medium- and high-density foam cushions offer sink-in comfort, supported by wire-spring suspension with a solid timber and engineered hardwood frame. Luxe yet laid-back, Stack’s layered cushions all feature removable covers in a choice of natural and polyester-blended fabrics. Stack comes with two detached arm cushions for added comfort, and an ottoman (sold separately) perfectly proportioned to the seat. Made in U.S.A.
  • Oversized proportions offer embracing comfort.
  • Solid timber and engineered hardwood frame for superior support.
  • Layered cushions feature completely removable covers.
  • Offered in natural and polyester blended fabrics.

title: Outline Sofa
description:
The Outline Collection (2016) takes its cues from modern architecture with an elegantly cubic form supported by slim pillars. Visually light with narrow, rounded, and perfectly cushioned arms and backs to maximize the seating area, Outline is exquisitely crafted for comfort. Made in the Slovak Republic.
  • Leather or fabric upholstery.
  • Molded foam cushions.
  • Aluminum legs.

title: Muse Corner Sectional
description:
“My collections are all about comfort, sculptural shapes, and bold proportions,” says Australian designer Sarah Ellison. With the Muse Corner Sectional, she’s expanded the Muse Collection into a spacious and inviting sectional with room for everyone. Ellison gravitates to 1970s design elements like overstuffed sofas and velvet, but takes them in a modern direction. With its modular form and luxe but low-maintenance fabrics, Muse is a dynamic showstopper that’s also wonderfully livable. Made in China.
  • Sculptural, comfortable form in sensual, textural materials.
  • Durably constructed with a corner-blocked kiln-dried hardwood frame.
  • Corner sectional makes it easy to fit ample seating into a room.
  • High quality hardware provides exceptional structural integrity.
  • Recessed solid oak feet make the sofa look like it’s floating.
  • Refined, but still relaxed and easygoing.

title: Mags Sofa
description:
The Mags Collection (2007) by HAY began with the notion that a sofa must have a very simple aesthetic because it’s so dominant in a room. With that in mind, it was designed as a deep, inviting space for stretching out and lounging. Mags features solid construction, plush cushions, and high armrests for lasting comfort and clean lines for a casual feel. Made in Mexico.
  • Features deep, low-slung seats, high armrests, and a firm sit.
  • Sleek, clean-lined silhouette.

title: Mags Soft Low Sofa
description:
Delivering maximum comfort with minimum details, the Mags Soft Low Collection (2007) by HAY began with the idea that a sofa must have a simple look because it’s so dominant in a room. With that in mind, it was designed as a low, deep, welcoming space in which to stretch out and lounge. This collection features solid construction and plush foam cushions to ensure lasting comfort, with rounded edges to keep the aesthetic casual. Made in Mexico.
  • Comfortable, inviting sofa with low, deep seats.
  • Features high-density down-wrapped foam cushions.
  • Rounded edges and soft cushions strike a casual note.

title: Lecco Sofa
description:
The most lavish sofa collection we’ve ever produced, Lecco (2019) embodies a spirit of expansiveness with extra-deep seating, abundant pillows and generous down filling. This collection was meticulously designed, down to its beautifully rounded corners, for which a special stitching technique was invented. Effortlessly cool but warmly inviting. Made in Italy.
  • Leather or fabric upholstery.
  • Down-filled and feather-blend cushions.
  • Effortlessly cool.
